name: @tekup/agentscope-backend
description: AgentScope Enhanced Backend - Python AI Agent Management System

scripts.dev: python -m venv venv && .\venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python app.py
scripts.install: python -m venv venv && .\venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: python -m venv venv && .\venv\Scripts\activate && pip install agentscope flask fastapi uvicorn
scripts.status: echo 'AgentScope Backend - Python Virtual Environment Status' && .\venv\Scripts\python --version 2>NUL || echo 'Virtual environment not activated'
